review: If you're getting this game for the story, you should. If you're getting it for the gameplay, don't. The story of wolfenstein is decent. Because who doesn't want to kill nazis? But the gameplay gets really repetetive as there isn't alot of variety in the weapons and even if you find something else other than the gun you start out with, it wouldn't be very different. My advice would be to wait until this game is on sale for less than $10 to buy it. 6/10
If you love far cry 3, you will love this game. If you haven't played far cry 3 you will love this game. If you love this game, I love you. 4/4
